description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              AS OUR BUSINESS RAPIDLY EXPANDS, WE ARE URGENTLY HIRING 3 ANALYST FOR OUR VIETNAM OFFICE TO PERFORM RECOVERY AUDITING SERVICES FOR OUR RETAIL CLIENTS BASED IN AUSTRALIA, NEW ZEALAND, USA, UK, ETC.
              

              - Study and examine the client’s documents (in English) related to: annual service agreements, joint business plans, promotional trading agreements, accounts payable papers, financial forms…
              
              - Based on pre-defined rules, process and capture the documents into structured data using our tools and templates
              
              - Study the accounts payable data, sales data, receipts data… (taken from ERP systems, documents, invoices…) and process this data following the pre-approved guidelines into the working analysis files
              
              - Analyse this data alongside various emails, documents… finding all discrepancies which have occurred between data and actual paper works
              
              - Identify the root causes and provide detailed reporting for any discrepancies found
              
              - Contact and discuss your findings with the project team or customers by e-mails, IM... and use our tools and all data available to resolve the discrepancies and attempt to recovery any funding which may be outstanding
              
              - Handle various data checks, and perform a review to ensure data consistency and accuracy
              
              - Other assignments by line manager
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	University degree in the related fields (Information System, Finance, Accounting…)
              
              -	At least 1 year experience in data analytics work
              

              SKILLS:
              

              -	Excellent level of English (written & verbal communication)
              
              -	Detail-oriented, careful manner
              
              -	Good analysis skill, love to work with figures / data
              
              -	A good team player to effectively work in a dedicated team
              
              -	Able to work under high pressure with good change management skill
              
              -	Good at MS Office, especially Excel, basic MS Access
              
              -	Basic knowledge of SQL queries and SQL databases
